version_description:
• When adding or editing an entry, the note will now scroll with your text if covered by the keyboard.
• Data exported to a CSV file is now aligned in the proper section if your entry does not contain a weather factor.

Thanks again to our users for all the feedback. Please keep it coming! Contact us through the FEEDBACK button in the app. A big thanks to all who have left ratings and reviews as well. All your efforts are a huge help.

• iCloud Backup is finally here. Backup your data to your iCloud account in the SETTINGS.
• Passcode access now with Face ID.
• Graphs now show ascending dates along the x-axis for easier reading (most recent mood is now displayed at the far right, instead of at the far left).
• Photos taken within the app are now saved to your device’s Camera Roll.

MOODY is now part of our new Growth Bundle. Get discounted premium access to our most popular productivity and lifestyle apps. Look for 'What's the Growth Bundle?' in the SETTINGS to learn more. 

Thanks again to our users for all the feedback. Please keep it coming! Contact us at apps@treebetty.com or through the FEEDBACK button in the app. A big thanks to all who have left ratings and reviews as well. All your efforts are a huge help.
